name: EditGithubReleaseAsset
description:
Edit a GitHub release asset with push access.

This tool allows users with push access to a GitHub repository to edit details of a release asset, such as its name or description. It should be called when there is a need to update release asset information.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: release_asset_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier of the release asset to update.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

parameters.name: alternate_asset_description
parameters.description: Provide an alternate short description of the release asset, used instead of the filename.

value_schema.description: An alternate short description of the asset. Used in place of the filename.

parameters.name: file_name_of_asset
parameters.description: The file name of the asset. This is used to uniquely identify the asset file for the release.

value_schema.description: The file name of the asset.

parameters.name: release_asset_state
parameters.description: Specifies the state of the release asset. Possible values might include 'uploaded', 'deleted', etc. (API documentation does not explicitly define options).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: An alternate short description of the asset. Used in place of the filename.

value_schema.description: An alternate short description of the asset. Used in place of the filename.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The file name of the asset.

value_schema.description: The file name of the asset.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
